name: Drain Runner (itch)
description:
In “Drain Runner,” you play as a janitor lost in the sewers beneath your workplace. Equipped with an experimental gravity gun (for cleaning, right?), all you want in life is a decent raise and a quiet, uneventful life, but sometimes your job calls for something more, demanding that you rise to the occasion and save yourself from a life lost in the depths. If only your equipment worked properly...

Featuring:

- Malfunctioning gravity gun

- Gritty sewer aesthetic

- Adaptable launchpad propulsion system
